sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';

import { Box, Text, Heading, Button } from 'grommet';

const choiceView = ({ item, toggleUi }) => {
  return (
    <Box background="accent-4" width="100%" height="100%" align="center">
      <Box 
        justify="around"
        align="center"
        height="85%"
        width="100%"
      >

        {/* title text */}
        <Box height="10%" border={{ color: "dark-1" }}>
          <Text 
            textAlign="center" 
            weight="bold" 
            size="medium"
          >
            You should try
          </Text>
        </Box>
        

        {/* CHOICE INFORMATION */}
        <Box height="70%" width="100%" border={{ color: "dark-1" }}>
          <Heading color="light-1" size="medium">{item.name}</Heading>
          <Box direction="row">
            <Text weight="bold">{item.title}</Text>
            <Text weight="bold">{item.distance}</Text>
          </Box>
        </Box>
        
        {/* TEXTO ABAJo */}
        <Box height="20%" pad="medium">
          <Text textAlign="center" weight="bold" size="small">
            You ran out of options, try again or tweak your custom search parameters
          </Text>
        </Box>
      </Box>

      <Box height="15%">
        <Button 
          onClick={() => toggleUi('landing')} 
          label="Try again" 
          color="dark-1" 
          primary
        />
      </Box>
    </Box>
  )
}

export default choiceView;
